urls.title: Katy Perry | Designer Collection
urls.description: Launched in Spring 2017, Katy Perry Collections features shoes that turn heads, stop traffic, and start conversations. Designed for women seeking bold, glamorous style at affordable prices, Katy Perry Collections brings the global popstar’s creative visions and stand-out style to life in a line that ranges from casual sandals and colorful sneakers to playful stilettos and sophisticated pumps.

urls.title: Katy Perry Women's The Jule Flat Sandal
urls.description: The Katy Perry Jule Flat Sandal features a padded sock lining and an adjustable ankle buckle closure. Don't let this minimalist thong sandal fool you. Adorned with a opulent, Egyptian inspired tubular metal detail this classic sandal is a must have warm-weather staple.
